scripts.build:chrome: rm -rf dist/chrome && mkdir -p dist/chrome && cp src/*.js src/*.html src/*.png dist/chrome/ && cp src/manifest.chrome.json dist/chrome/manifest.json
scripts.build:firefox: rm -rf dist/firefox && mkdir -p dist/firefox && cp src/*.js src/*.html src/*.png dist/firefox/ && cp src/manifest.firefox.json dist/firefox/manifest.json
scripts.build: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.package:chrome: npm run build:chrome && cd dist/chrome && zip -r ../../powerpacks-data-exporter-$npm_package_version-chrome.zip .
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && cd dist/firefox && zip -r ../../powerpacks-data-exporter-$npm_package_version-firefox.zip .
scripts.package: npm run package:chrome && npm run package:firefox
